attributes.action: Start Voluntary Donations to the NHS pot
attributes.additional_details:
The bill that this virus will leave the country, is one that we need to pay and we need to be planning for that now.
If we leave it too much longer, it will already be too late.
attributes.background:
Set up a donations page giving people the ability to add additional funds in to the NHS pot. 
Many of us do not have the medical skills to help with what is currently happening but may be able to assist by adding even just a few extra pounds in to the pot to assist.

rejection.details:
Members of the public can already donate to NHS Charities.

You can find out more here: https://www.nhscharitiestogether.co.uk
